segments.text: What a lovely tapestry ! Don't you think we could use one to decorate our room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think we can have a try .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Artistic tapestry is the highest form of expression of the rug weaving art , an exquisite handicraft of superb artistry in typical Chinese style .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Is this the marvelous landscape in Guiling ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which do you prefer , the linen one , the figured dacron or the brocade ?
segments.speaker: S2
